page.title: 10RECREATION IN FOUR LANES.
page.content: On the whole people have to make there own recreation as there no places of public entertainment.There are two Public Houses,The Sportmans Arms and The Victoria Inn. Both these Pubs run darts teams for ladies and gents. In addition they have Pool tables which are popular. There is a Womens Institute which is well supported and meets regularly in our School.The village has a very good and widely respected Male Voice Choir which competes in festivals all over the country with great success.There is a Mens Institute which is supported mainly by the older men of the village.
